Song.title: Let Your Kingdom Come
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Bob Kauflin © 2006 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [||: G | D | Em7 | C2 :|| C2]
VERSE 1: [Dsus4] [ ]Your glorious [C2]cause, O God,[G] [ ]engages our hearts [Dsus4] [ ]May Jesus [C2]Christ be known{,} [Em7] [ ]wherever we are [D] [ ]We ask not [C2]for ourselves, [G/B] [ ]but for Your re[C]nown [G] [D] [ ]The cross has [C2]saved us so we [Bm]Pray Your kingdom [C2]come
CHORUS: Let Your [G]kingdom [D]come, let Your [Em7]will be [C2]done So that [G]every[D]one might know Your [Em7]Name [C2] [ ]Let Your [G]song be h[D]eard{,} every[Em7]where on e[C2]arth Till Your [Em7]sovereign w[D]ork on earth is d[C2]one Let Your kingdom [G]come [| D | Em7 | C2 | G | D | C2 | C2]
VERSE 2: [Dsus] [ ]Give us Your [C2]strength, O God, [G] [ ]And courage to speak [Dsus] [ ]Perform Your [C2]wondrous deeds, [Em7] [ ]Through those who are weak [D] [ ]Lord use us [C2]as You want, [G/B] [ ]Whatever the [C]test [G] [D] [ ]By grace we’ll [C2]preach Your gospel [Bm]Till our dying [C2]breath
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 your glorious cause o god engages our hearts may jesus christ be known wherever we are we ask not for ourselves but for your renown the cross has saved us so we pray your kingdom come chorus let your kingdom come let your will be done so that everyone might know your name let your song be heard everywhere on earth till your sovereign work on earth is done let your kingdom come verse 2 give us your strength o god and courage to speak perform your wondrous deeds through those who are weak lord use us as you want whatever the test by grace well preach your gospel till our dying breath
